meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with their own power and importance.
meanings.sent1: Some megalomaniacs believe they are the most important people in the world.
meanings.sent2: The megalomaniacs in the story wanted to control everything around them.
meanings.sent3: The megalomaniacs at the office always thought they knew best.
meanings.sent4: Her boss behaved like a megalomaniac, trying to control every aspect of the project.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was portrayed as a megalomaniac, seeking ultimate power.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with megalomaniacs, each vying for attention.
meanings.sent2: The megalomaniacs gathered in the meeting room, each wanting to be heard.
meanings.sent3: The group of megalomaniacs argued over who should lead the project.
meanings.sent4: The team of megalomaniacs clashed over their individual visions for success.
meanings.sent5: The megalomaniacs' egos clashed, creating tension in the room.
